properties.Title: Freezing Drizzle Advisory In Effect
properties.Summary:
Description: Freezing drizzle is expected to persist into tonight. ### Freezing drizzle can produce thin, hard-to-detect layers of ice. Freezing drizzle advisories are issued when drizzle falling in sub-zero temperatures is expected to freeze on contact, and over time create icy surfaces. Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to NUstorm@canada.ca or tweet reports using #NUStorm.
Expires: 2019-05-06T23:27:27-00:00
Originated from CAP Alert: Environment Canada, 2019-05-06T14:28:27-00:00, urn:oid:2.49.0.1.124.1996268278.2019
Area: Resolute
properties.Author: Environment Canada
